name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building scalable backend systems and AI-powered tooling.
I care about tools that reduce friction between ideas and execution. My work spans Go backends, TypeScript tooling, and AI agent integrations through MCP.
Side projects: aiocean.io (AI development tools), writing at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus.
Founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016, connecting 10K+ developers.
Top projects: obsidian-open-gate (222⭐ - Obsidian web integration), jira-mcp (79⭐ - Go MCP connector), google-kit (20⭐ - Google services toolkit).
I approach engineering with product thinking: start small, iterate fast, validate assumptions. Build for real problems, not hypothetical ones.
Based in Vietnam, working remotely across timezones.
now: Building Claude plugins for AI-powered development workflows
Developing investment tracking and financial visualization tools
Iterating on MCP integrations and AI tooling experiments
